name: Extreme Fitness - Personal Training West Coast

reviews.text: Good place to start your fitness journey. Personal training programs is good, I have grow stronger after few sessions of strength training. Highly recommended, look for coach Shawn and his team!

I've been a member of this gym for a month now, and I have to say, it's been an amazing experience! The facilities are top-notch, always clean and well-maintained.
The staff and coaches are friendly and knowledgeable, always willing to help with any questions or concerns.
The atmosphere is motivating and supportive. I've seen significant progress in my fitness journey, Highly recommended!

Joined Extreme Fitness in Jan and I couldn’t be happier with my experience! Did some PT sessions with Thapelo and he has been very motivating, helping me achieve my fitness goals and always ready to answer any doubts I may have. The gym also has a wide variety of equipment for all types of workouts. Highly recommend this gym to anyone looking for a great place to work out!

"I've been a member at Extreme Fitness Singapore for over a year now, and I can honestly say it's been a life-changing experience! The trainers are top-notch, knowledgeable, and genuinely invested in helping you achieve your fitness goals. They're always pushing you to be your best, but also know when to scale back and focus on proper form.

The gym environment is clean, well-maintained, and equipped with state-of-the-art equipment. It's clear that the management takes pride in creating a welcoming and motivating space for members to work out.

What really sets Extreme Fitness apart, though, is the sense of community. The trainers and staff are always friendly and approachable, and the other members are supportive and encouraging. It's amazing to see people from all walks of life come together to sweat, grind, and celebrate each other's successes.

Personally, I've seen incredible results since joining Extreme Fitness. I've lost weight, increased my strength and endurance, and gained confidence in my abilities. But it's not just about the physical transformation – it's about the mental and emotional growth that comes with pushi. Highly recommend gym.

Best personal training gym I’ve been to. Extreme fitness meets my standards of training, well catered meal plans follow ups and fitness assessments. The trainers shows their motivative qualities when training their clients and a very fitness family oriented. The gym is open 24hrs highly recommended to start their fitness journey
